item.title: Welcome to Open Physics Education
item.description:
Welcome to our new site! We’re excited to share open physics education resources with you.

What We Do

Open Physics Education is dedicated to creating and sharing high-quality physics resources that are:

  • Free and Open: All materials are freely available to use and modify
  • Accessible: Created with diverse learners in mind
  • Comprehensive: Covering fundamental physics through advanced topics
  • Community-Driven: Built by educators and physicists worldwide

Getting Started

Explore our resources and join our community. Whether you’re a student learning physics for the first time or an educator looking for classroom materials, we have something for you.

item.title: Getting Started with Physics Education Resources
item.description:
This post introduces our collection of physics education resources and how to get the most out of them.

Organization

Our resources are organized by topic and difficulty level:

  • Mechanics: Classical and modern mechanics
  • Thermodynamics: Heat and energy
  • Waves & Optics: Wave phenomena and light
  • Electromagnetism: Electric and magnetic fields
  • Modern Physics: Quantum mechanics and relativity

Using These Resources

All materials are available in multiple formats:

  • Web Format: View directly in your browser
  • PDF: Download for offline use
  • Source Files: Modify and adapt for your needs

Contributing

Found an error? Want to improve a resource? All our materials are open source. Visit our GitHub repository to contribute.
